Game.Name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (Brazil) (Es,Pt)
Game.plot: Overview:Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego? is the first game in the Carmen Sandiego edutainment series of adventure games from Broderbund Software. In this game, the player is cast in the role of a detective with the ACME Detective Agency tasked with solving thefts committed by members of V.I.L.E., a criminal organization headed by the mysterious Carmen Sandiego. A world atlas was bundled with the game in order to assist players with certain clues.Gameplay:At the start of each case, the player begins by traveling to the scene of the crime. By questioning witnesses, clues are gathered which point towards the thief's characteristics, as well as his or her next destination. It is the player's responsibility to gather the information and interpret it correctly. Once the player has enough clues, a warrant for a suspect can be issued. After tailing the suspect from country to country, the player will eventually catch up and, if it's the correct suspect, make an arrest.Cheat: Mission PasswordsAfter entering your details at the front-end, type in the following codes to commence on a particular mission. Game.Notes: Description in English Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? is an educational video game released in 1985. It is the earliest version of Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? as well as the first product in the entire Carmen Sandiego franchise. The game was distributed with The World Almanac and Book of Facts, published by Pharos Books. Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego? was included in some software packages with the Amiga 500. Descripción en Español Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? (¿Dónde en el mundo está Carmen Sandiego?) es un videojuego educativo lanzado en 1985. Es la primera versión de "Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?" así como el primer producto en toda la franquicia Carmen Sandiego. El juego se distribuye con El Almanaque Mundial y el Libro de Datos, publicado por Libros Pharos. Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? fue incluido en algunos paquetes de software con el Amiga 500.
